name: The Undead Mafia
description:
Unity 2D Zombie Shooter: The Undead Mafia

This is a demo for a dungeon crawler /shooter game.

  1. To play download the TheUndeadMafia.zip.
  2. Extract the TheUndeadMafia.Zip.
  3. Open up the TheUndeadMafia.exe file.

Chose from one of 4 characters and try make it to the end of the 15th 8th floor. In this demo you have a generous amount of ammo for each weapon.

As this is a demo, enemies, characters and weapons may be imbalanced, there may be bugs and there are features I am planning on including that are not present yet.
